headline: I made my first project!
blurb: Hi everybody, Just starting my blog here on Medium, and for my inaugural post, I wanted to share my first project through General Assembly! I had a blast creating a pass-and-play version of the game Onitama using nothing but HTML, CSS, and JavaScript...

headline: Ben works really hard
blurb: You should hire him because he's nice.

headline: Cities, Genres, and Titles, oh my!
blurb: So, I’m almost done with my full stack immersive at General Assembly, and I made a really exciting feature for Project 3! We needed to make a full CRUD app, with a MongoDB database, and there’s all kinds of interesting stuff to talk about, BUT, I tend to gravitate toward User Experience, visual design, and other delightful things you can find in the world of Front End Development...
